channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for FL
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for FL

item.title: Report X-2024080118
item.description:
Report X-2024080118

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-06T15:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-30
  • City: JACKSONVILLE
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THIS PACKAGEIS A SPILL, IT IS NOT CONSIDERED HAZMAT ACCORDING TO FTRACK AND NO INFORMATION BEING ON THE BOX SAYING SO. THERE IS HAZARD INFORMATION ON ITS SDS. I WILL USE THIS INFORMATIONN TO SAY SECTION 16 THAT DID NOT APPEAR. ALSO, THERE IS NO SHIPPER INFORMATION OTHER THAN THAT SHIPPER NAME I do not know the zip code. FOR NUMBER 14 I CANNOT READ THE BOX INFORMATION DUE TO IT BEING COVERED IN BROWN STAIN.

item.title: Report X-2024072101
item.description:
Report X-2024072101

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-02T18:16:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-24
  • City: JACKSONVILLE
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: WET BOX DISCOVERED DURING PRELOAD SORT. BOX TAKEN TO HAZMAT CAGE. UPON INSPECTION, DISCOVERED THAT VALVE ON BAG INSIDE BOX WAS PARTIALLY OPEN, CAUSING LEAK. BOX PLACED IN PLASTIC BAG AND SALVAGE DRUM, AND PLACED IN HAZMAT CAGE.
